mapper.insert: INSERT INTO picture (uploader, picture_name, picture_type, picture_id, picture_origin, is_delete, updated_at, created_at) VALUES (#{entity.uploader}, #{entity.pictureName}, #{entity.pictureType}, #{entity.pictureId}, #{entity.pictureOrigin, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.BlobTypeHandler}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.updatedAt}, #{entity.createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, use_times, uploader, picture_name, picture_type, picture_id, created_at, updated_at FROM picture WHERE is_delete = FALSE;
